description: A timeless favorite, our Classic Cheeseburger features a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, and our special sauce.
Experience the simplicity of Italian cuisine with our Margherita Pizza, featuring a thin crust, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
For bacon lovers, our Double Bacon Burger comes with two beef patties, crispy bacon strips, cheddar cheese, and all the fixings.
Indulge in the classic taste of Pepperoni Pizza with its generous layer of pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese, and zesty tomato sauce.
Our Veggie Burger is a plant-based delight, featuring a tasty veggie patty, lettuce, tomato, and your choice of condiments.
Escape to the tropics with our Hawaiian Pizza, topped with ham, pineapple chunks, and a blend of cheeses.
Kick up the heat with our Spicy Chicken Burger, featuring a crispy chicken fillet, spicy mayo, and fresh veggies.
Enjoy the works with our Supreme Pizza, loaded with pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, olives, and more.
Savor the earthy flavors of our Mushroom Swiss Burger, featuring a beef patty, sautéed mushrooms, and Swiss cheese.
Escape to the tropics with our Hawaiian Pizza, topped with ham, pineapple chunks, and a blend of cheeses.
Dive into flavor with our Fish Burger, featuring crispy fish fillets, lettuce, and tartar sauce on a soft bun.
Take your taste buds on a journey with our Mediterranean Pizza, loaded with olives, feta cheese, artichokes, and more.
Our Vegan Burger is a cruelty-free delight, made with a plant-based patty, fresh veggies, and vegan mayo.
Escape to the tropics with our Hawaiian Pizza, topped with ham, pineapple chunks, and a blend of cheeses.
Our Bang Burger is a cruelty-free delight, made with a plant-based patty, fresh veggies, and vegan mayo.
Try our Turkey Burger, a healthier option with a juicy turkey patty, lettuce, tomato, and cranberry mayo.
